title: [Large-scale] Web-Based Training (WBT) Design Process Using Collaborative Authoring

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and intermediate expertise in social studies fields
context.additional_context: A program cultivating WBT (Web-Based Training) content design competencies in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Perform macro design of WBT by applying collaborative authoring methodologies
Apply Rhetorical Structure Theory (RST)-based content structuring strategies to practical cases
Produce effective WBT content under technical constraints by utilizing various role allocation methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
